servinfo.title: Fuel Leakage Check Procedure
servinfo.ptxt: After performing any service on fuel system, check that there is no fuel leakage as follows.

s1.ptxt: Apply fuel pressure to fuel feed line according to the following procedure.

s2.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position to operate fuel pump.
Repeat step a) and b) three or four times.
Make sure that fuel pressure is applied to fuel line by placing hand on fuel feed hose and feel fuel pressure.

s1.ptxt: Check that there is no fuel leakage from any part of fuel system.
